mdRecord.dcterms:description: This seems to be part of a larger handwritten document. The pages are numbered at the top. The back of each sheet is blank. The beginning of thiese pages reads, "Place of Prayer a horror of great darkness overcome Him he had lost the prescence of the Father. Without this he learnd that in his human nature he could not Endure the Test."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Place of Prayer, Handwritten
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: American poetry -- African American authors
